wishText: Happy Birthday! We dont get to choose our families, but we do get to choose our friends‚Äîand you've been closer than family to me. Wishing you a day filled with joy, laughter, and all the amazing things you love. Have a fantastic year ahead, filled with every happiness and blessing! üéâ
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
